definition: to stew in soy sauce and spices
"water" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 85), occurring in 没, 法, 流 etc/see also 三點水|三点水[san1 dian3 shui3]
food prepared by stewing in soy sauce and spices

sentences.english: The technological key to leaching mining of underground polyhalite is the extraction of effective constitutes from polyhalite.
sentences.chinese: 溶浸開採雜滷石的技術關鍵在於其中有效成分的溶出。

sentences.english: Low smoke, zero halogen flame retardant sheath.
sentences.chinese: 低煙無滷阻燃護套，環保。

sentences.english: Heating in low temperature could prolong the shelf-life of the spiced beef in a certain extent.
sentences.chinese: 低溫加熱滅菌可在一定程度上延長滷牛肉的貨架期。

sentences.english: Halogen atoms contain seven electrons in their valence shell.
sentences.chinese: 滷原子在它們的介電子層含有七個電子。

sentences.english: The dead cysts in the collection of Barkol Lake were mainly emerged in spring.
sentences.chinese: 巴里坤湖成品滷蟲卵中的死卵主要產生在春季。

sentences.english: Copper conductor XLPE insulated low-smoke and non-halo sheathed Flame-retardant power cable.
sentences.chinese: 銅芯交聯聚乙烯絕緣低煙無滷護套阻燃電力電纜。

sentences.english: The photographic elements contain a blue-sensitive hydrophilic colloid silver halide emulsion layer.
sentences.chinese: 照像材料含有親水膠體的感藍鹵化銀滷劑層。

sentences.english: Halogen bond is known as a kind of non-covalent intermolecular interaction.
sentences.chinese: 滷鍵是一種類似氫鍵的分子間弱相互作用。

sentences.english: But hydrogenations of halogenated nitrobenzene with amorphous alloy have been not reported up to now.
sentences.chinese: 非晶態合金催化劑用於滷代硝基苯的加氫還未見報道。

sentences.english: Low smoke, zero halogen and flame retardant sheath.
sentences.chinese: 低煙無滷阻燃護套，環保。

sentences.english: Alkylation of wheat straw alkaline lignin was conducted by reacting lignin with different alkyl halides .
sentences.chinese: 用不同的滷代烷烴與鹼木質素進行烷基化反應。

sentences.english: The model can be used to explain the dehalogenation mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 該模型可用於解釋滷代芳烴化合物還原脫滷的機理。

sentences.english: The yield of O-alkylation of 2,5-dimethylphenol with the monohalogen carboxylic esters is above 81%.
sentences.chinese: 二甲苯酚與一滷代羧酸酯的反應產率在81%以上。

sentences.english: Before the Middle Qing, Wunquan brine wells were primitive ones with natural state.
sentences.chinese: 清代中葉以前，溫泉滷井是一種自然狀態的原始井。

sentences.english: The non-halogen fire retardant area is the development direction in Japan up to date and in the future.
sentences.chinese: 非滷阻燃是日本阻燃技術近年及今後的發展方向。

sentences.english: This paper discussed the relationship between laser irradiation time and hatching rate of ArtemIa eggs.
sentences.chinese: 本文討論了激光照射時間與滷蟲卵孵化率之間的關係。

definition: to cook in a covered vessel/to casserole/to stew
thick paste of fermented soybean/marinated in soy paste/paste/jam
flour/noodles/(of food) soft (not crunchy)/(slang) (of a person) ineffectual/spineless
soup/hot or boiling water/decoction of medicinal herbs/water in which sth has been boiled
to braise/to cook in soy and vinegar/braised/cooked in soy and vinegar
to simmer/soup made by simmering for a long time
